Text: ezboardcom account validation instructionsTo validate your free ezboardcom account please click on the URL web address below You will also receive a second email with your User Name and Password once you are validated If you are an AOL user or you do not see a link below Please copy the URL web address and paste it into your browser Netscape Internet Explorer or AOL Then click enter to view the validation screen and to activate your account Here is your validation URL btexasmilitaryforcesmuseumvljreitmev

ezboardcom account validation instructionsTo validate your free ezboardcom account please click on the URL web address below You will also receive a second email with your User Name and Password once you are validated If you are an AOL user or you do not see a link below Please copy the URL web address and paste it into your browser Netscape Internet Explorer or AOL Then click enter to view the validation screen and to activate your account Here is your validation URL btexasmilitaryforcesmuseumvljreitmev

Welcome to the Texas Military Forces Museum EzBoard Online CommunityCongratulations jreitme You are now a registered member of the Texas Military Forces Museum ezboard Online Community Here is LOCAL account information Login Name jreitme Password aggieswin As a local user your account will ONLY work on this particular ezboard You may use the following link to get therebtexasmilitaryforcesmuseum As a registered ezboard user we invite you to join our Community Supported Communities CSC program CSC is a low cost way in which you can support your communities and ezboard In return for your support wed like to give you a personal noad account no ezboardsponsored advertisements wherever you go on the site Well also give you a unique Community Supporter icon and enhanced customer service At only for six months this is your opportunity to show the world how much your communities mean to you by becoming a CSC member To learn more please visit our CSC info page here promotionscscuserhtml Please keep this email for your files as it contains your account information
